title: The Legal and Regulatory Environment of Business 15 th Edition
description:
The Legal and Regulatory Environment of Business, 16/e

From: https://forum.suprbay.org/showthread.php?tid=461&pid=2210#pid2210


O. Lee Reed, University of Georgia
Marisa Anne Pagnattaro, University of Georgia
Daniel R. Cahoy, Pennsylvania State University
Peter J. Shedd, University of Georgia
Jere W. Morehead, University of Georgia

ISBN: 0073524999
Copyright year: 2013

In 1963, the first edition of The Legal and Regulatory Environment of Business, authored by Bob Corley, initiated a focus on the legal environment in which business is conducted. Understanding the importance of having students study the public nature of how government regulates business activities, rather than simply how businesses privately make transactions, universities moved away from traditional Business Law. Fifteen editions later, ReedÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s The Legal and Regulatory Environment of Business has been the leader in setting the standard for materials that demonstrate that law is at the core of the private market and plays a crucial role in business.
